channel.title: CVE Feed for Fullworks -- Quick Event Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fullworks -- Quick Event Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-23974|2023-03-01T12:33:35.686Z -- fullworks -- quick%20event%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Event Manager plugin <= 9.7.4 affecting all registration actions (delete, delete all, edit, update).

item.title: CVE-2023-23979|2023-04-06T05:17:03.440Z -- fullworks -- quick%20event%20manager
item.description: Unauth. Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Event Manager plugin <= 9.7.4 versions.
